title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 339.4 - Emeritus status
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 339.4 - Emeritus status

State Regulations

Members of the University faculty who retire in good
standing, in accordance with the provisions of Title B or C of this Part shall
be entitled to append the term Emeritus to the title of their academic or
administrative post after the time of retirement. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
339.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
